title: Mittermaier (Dr. Carlos)
body: German doctor who was in Funchal from 1852 to 1854 and made valuable meteorological observations here. Ref.: Madeira und seine Bedeutung als Heilungsort; Heidelberg, 1855.

Funchal: Location of Dr. Carlos Mittermaier's stay

Dr. Carlos Mittermaier: Made valuable meteorological observations in Funchal

1852: Dr. Carlos Mittermaier was in Funchal
1854: Dr. Carlos Mittermaier was in Funchal
